msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice, I see you've got !I've got one in my home too, but something's different about yours<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />It's because of your custom design! Customized DIY furniture can really give a home that personal touch.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I really love the look of your !<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I have a piece just like yours that I've refurbished, but it doesn't look as good as yours, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, I'm pretty sure I have in this style! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I guess that means we have similar taste in furniture That's great!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Except for the custom design of yours, I've got almost the same ! <20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I love how you can use a custom design to make ordinary furniture feel like your own original pieces.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Guess what? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />At home, I have like this!It's great that we have the same taste in furniture, .
